response.overview: A gangster, Nino, is in the Cash Money Brothers, making a million dollars every week selling crack. A cop, Scotty, discovers that the only way to infiltrate the gang is to become a dealer himself.
response.tagline: They're a new breed of gangster. The new public enemy. The new family of crime.
response.title: New Jack City
